select table_name,table_comment FROM information_schema.`TABLES` where 1=1 and table_schema=#{tableSchema}
AND table_name like concat ('%',#{tableName},'%')

select COLUMN_NAME sqlcolname,COLUMN_COMMENT displayName,DATA_TYPE colType from information_schema.`COLUMNS` c where 1=1 and TABLE_SCHEMA=#{tableSchema} and COLUMN_KEY!='PRI'
AND table_name =#{tableName}
